users.bio: Specializing in vibrant digital landscapes. All art is 100% human-created.
Minimalist geometric designs with a focus on color theory.
Always looking for high-score, original digital prints.
Collector of hand-crafted illustrations and line art.

listings.title: Cosmic Drift (High Confidence)
listings.description: A truly original, hand-painted digital masterpiece capturing the essence of the cosmos.

listings.title: Neon Cityscape (Medium Confidence)
listings.description: A vibrant city scene, manually detailed. Note: Some minor post-processing used.

listings.title: The Last Line (Very High Confidence)
listings.description: Pure line art, drawn stroke by stroke. The highest standard of authenticity.

listings.title: Oceanic Depths (Low Confidence)
listings.description: Transparency is key: this work involved heavy use of algorithmic filters and generative tools.

listings.title: Aurora Trails (High Confidence)
listings.description: Long-form brushwork creating a flowing aurora above stark mountains.

listings.title: Chromatic Squares (Medium Confidence)
listings.description: Geometric play with hues; color theory study in a grid.

listings.title: Quiet Harbor (Very High Confidence)
listings.description: Muted, hand-detailed harbor at dusk; emphasis on light and reflection.

reviews.comment: Absolutely love the detail! And the 98% score made me confident in the purchase.
Great piece, though the 75% score gave me a moment's pause. Still a great download.
Flawless line work. 100% authenticity score is well-deserved.
